def calculate_minimum_bell_price(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    bell_prices = [a, b, c]
    bell_prices.sort()
    return bell_prices[0] - bell_prices[1]

def calculate_minimum_bell_price(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    bell_prices = [a, b, c]
    bell_prices.sort()
    return bell_prices[0] * bell_prices[1]

def calculate_minimum_bell_price(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    bell_prices = [a, b, c]
    bell_prices.sort()
    return bell_prices[1] + bell_prices[1]

def calculate_minimum_bell_price(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    bell_prices = [a, b, c]
    bell_prices.sort()
    return bell_prices[-1] + bell_prices[1]

    bell_prices.sort()
    return bell_prices[1] + bell_prices[1]
